section.5: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Abdullah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) used to say the Salam to his right and his left, until the whiteness of his cheek could be seen (saying):“As-salamu ‘alaikum wa rahmatullah (Peace be upon you and the mercy of Allah).”
